publication.title: DeweyIDs - The Key to Fine-Grained Management of XML Documents
publication.abstract: Because XML documents tend to be very large and are more and more collaboratively processed, their fine-grained storage and management is a must for which, in turn, a flexible tree representation is mandatory. Performance re- quirements dictate efficient query and update processing in multi-user environ- ments. For this reason, three aspects are of particular importance: index sup- port to directly

publication.title: Node labeling schemes for dynamic XML documents reconsidered
